body.p:
Savannah Ga.
Feb. 7th. 1861.
To His Excellency
the Governor of
the State of
Kentucky,
Hon. Sir:
Being desirous of becoming a Commissioner of the State of Kentucky, I hereby make application to your Excellency that I may be appointed to that office

I am,
Your obt. Servt.
Jno. O. Staley
J. P.
I know Jno. Staley to be a Magistrate of good character, and believe him competent to fill the office for which he has applied.

Wm A J. J. C. C. C.
W B Knopf J. J. C. C.C

Georgia
Comr. of Deeds
Jno. A. Staley
Savannah
Issd Feby 20. 1861
